name: Pirelli & C. SpA
bossPosition: Vice Presidente Esecutivo e Amministratore Delegato
goal:
Founded in Milan in 1872, Pirelli is a major player in the tyre industry and the only global player focused solely on the Consumer tyre market, which includes tyres for cars, motorcycles and bicycles. With a distinctive positioning in High Value tyres, the Group stands as a global brand known for its cutting edge technology, high-end production excellence and passion for innovation that draws heavily on its Italian roots.
With 19 factories located in 12 countries and around 31,500 employees, Pirelli had a turnover of €5.2 billion in 2018, and with 15,900 points of sale in over 160 countries – a growing sales network that puts Pirelli ever closer to its customers.
The company supports over 460 car and motorcycle sport events and has been the exclusive tyre supplier to the Formula One™ World Championship since 2011.
All of this has grown from a strong commitment to research and development, undertaken with an open and collaborative approach. Pirelli has 1,900 people engaged in R&D located across its Milan headquarters and 12 local technology centers and a portfolio of about 6,100 patents. In the last three years, Pirelli’s investment in R&D has been 6.5% of its revenues from High Value products - one of the highest levels among the world’s major tyre producers.
